Method used to remove a Category from the album using an index

Method to remove a single category TODO: use category instead of index
RemoveCategory - Class in functionalities
Class that creates the Remove Category Window when the user presses the remove button It has a list of the categories that can be removed from the selected album and the category icon is displayed on the left
RemoveCategory(PhotoAlbum, LowerPanel) - Constructor for class functionalities.RemoveCategory
Initialize the Remove Category Window
RemoveImage - Class in functionalities
Class that creates the Remove Window when the user presses the remove button It has a list of images that can be removed from the selected category and the image is displayed on the left
RemoveImage(LowerPanel) - Constructor for class functionalities.RemoveImage
Initialize the Remove Image Window
removeInfos() - Method in class layout.LeftPanel
Method to remove old informations from the panel
repaintPan(boolean) - Method in class layout.CustomWindow
Method used to repaint
retrieveIndex() - Method in class layout.ImagePanel
Method used to retrieve the Index of the Image opened
